info.name: StyleSync API
info.description: Clean minimal collection for StyleSync API testing

item.name: Health & Monitoring

request.description: Returns basic health status of the StyleSync API application. This endpoint provides a quick way to verify the application is running and responsive.
Checks the database connection status and returns connection information. This endpoint verifies that the application can successfully connect to and query the PostgreSQL database.
Returns comprehensive health information including application details, database status, and system metrics. This endpoint provides detailed diagnostics for monitoring and troubleshooting.

item.description: Application and system health check endpoints

request.description: Admin endpoint. Retrieves a list of all countries with their address format configurations.
Admin endpoint. Retrieves country information and address format rules by ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.
Admin endpoint. Retrieves country information by its unique ID.
Admin endpoint. Updates country information and address format configuration.
Admin endpoint. Deletes a country from the system. Only possible if the country has no associated branches.

item.name: Multi-Tenant Authentication

request.description: Retrieve all customers the authenticated user has access to. Returns customer summaries with id, name, urlSlug, and logoUrl.
Validate customer context and retrieve customer information. Used for URL-based customer recognition in /salon/{customer-slug} routes.

item.description: Enhanced authentication with customer context and URL-based access

request.description: Get customer branding configuration by URL slug. Public endpoint - no authentication required.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Update customer branding configuration. Admin only - requires authentication.

response.name: Success Response

exec: console.log('‚úÖ Branding created successfully with files');

formdata.description: Logo image file (PNG, JPG, JPEG, SVG, WebP - max 5MB)
Apple touch icon file (PNG, JPG, JPEG - max 2MB)

request.description: Initial customer branding setup with file uploads and configuration. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ONLY ‚ö†Ô∏è Rate limited to 3 requests per minute.
Update customer branding files without changing configuration. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ONLY ‚ö†Ô∏è Rate limited to 5 requests per minute.

item.name: Branches Management

request.description: Admin endpoint. Retrieves a list of all active branches with their customer relationships.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Admin endpoint. Creates a new branch location associated with a customer.

request.description: Admin endpoint. Soft deletes a branch. Only possible if the branch has no associated professionals, bookings, or service pricing.

exec: console.log('Customer branch created, ID saved:', json.data.id);

request.description: Creates a new branch for the current customer. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è Only ADMIN users can create branches. Customer ID is automatically determined from URL context.

request.description: Get branches filtered by customer context. ‚úÖ Available to both ADMIN and CLIENT users. URL pattern: /salon/{customer-slug}/branches

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Update branch information within customer context. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è Only ADMIN users can update branches. Only branches belonging to the current customer can be updated.

response.name: Not Found Response

request.description: Soft delete a branch within customer context. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è Only ADMIN users can delete branches. The branch will be marked as deleted but not physically removed from the database.

response.name: Not Found Response

item.description: Customer-scoped branch management (ADMIN: Full CRUD, CLIENT: Read-only)
Complete branch management with admin and customer operations

item.name: Professionals Management

request.description: Retrieves a list of all professionals in the system. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è Only ADMIN users can access this endpoint.
Creates a new professional. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è Only ADMIN users can create professionals.

response.name: Conflict Response

request.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific professional by its ID. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è Only ADMIN users can access this endpoint.
Updates information for an existing professional. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è Only ADMIN users can update professionals.

formdata.description: Professional photo file (PNG, JPG, JPEG, SVG, WebP)

request.description: Uploads a photo for a professional. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è Only ADMIN users can upload professional photos.
Deletes the photo for a professional. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è Only ADMIN users can delete professional photos.
Deactivates a professional from the system. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è Only ADMIN users can deactivate professionals. Only possible if the professional has no associated bookings.

item.name: Professionals - Customer

request.description: Retrieves all professionals for the current customer context.

exec: console.log('Customer professional created, ID saved:', json.data.id);

request.description: Creates a new professional for the current customer context. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è Only ADMIN users can create professionals. Customer ID is automatically determined from URL context.
Retrieves a specific professional within the customer context.
Updates a professional within the customer context. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è Only ADMIN users can update professionals.
Deactivates a professional within the customer context. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è Only ADMIN users can deactivate professionals.

item.description: Customer-scoped professional management (ADMIN: Full CRUD, CLIENT: Read-only)

request.description: Retrieves all active professionals working at a specific branch within the customer context.

item.description: Complete professional management with admin, customer, and branch-specific operations
